StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetXmlRecruiter369MonthEval]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MonthEvalID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT mme.ID ,Evalua.onTypeID ,et.Name AS EvalTypeName ,TrainingFileID ,Es.matedDate ,CompletedDate ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy ,Remarks ,SentToDistrictDate ,SentToDistrictSignature ,RsCoSignature ,RsCoSignDate ,AopSignature ,AopSignDate ,OsoSignature ,OsoSignDate ,( SELECT ev.ID ,Mul.MonthEvalua.onID ,MonthIncrement ,Remarks ,Es.matedDate ,ReviewBy AS 'ReviewBySignature/SignatureID' ,U1.FirstName AS 'ReviewBySignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U1.MiddleName AS 'ReviewBySignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U1.LastName AS 'ReviewBySignature/SignatureLastName' ,ReviewByDate ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on ev LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = ev.ReviewBy WHERE ev.Mul.MonthEvalua.onID = mme.ID ORDER BY MonthIncrement FOR XML PATH('MonthlyEvalua.on'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) AS MonthlyEvalua.ons
,( SELECT et.ID ,Mul.MonthEvalua.onId ,etg.Designa.on AS GroupDesig ,etg.Title AS GroupTitle ,etg.Reference AS GroupRef ,et.Title ,et.Designa.on ,et.Reference ,FirstMonthValue ,SecondMonthValue ,ThirdMonthValue ,DateCer..ed ,NCOICSignatureID AS 'NCOICSignature/SignatureID' ,U1.FirstName AS 'NCOICSignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U1.MiddleName AS 'NCOICSignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U1.LastName AS 'NCOICSignature/SignatureLastName' ,RecruiterSignatureID AS 'RecruiterSignature/SignatureID' ,U2.FirstName AS 'RecruiterSignature/SignatureFirstName' ,U2.MiddleName AS 'RecruiterSignature/SignatureMiddleName' ,U2.LastName AS 'RecruiterSignature/SignatureLastName' ,RISignatureID ,LastUpdatedDate ,LastUpdatedBy ,EvalSignatureID ,OSOSignatureID FROM USMC.Evalua.onTask et LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.Evalua.onTaskGroup AS etg ON etg.ID = et.Evalua.onTaskGroupID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = et.NCOICSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U2 ON U2.UserID = et.RecruiterSignatureID WHERE et.Mul.MonthEvalua.onId=mme.ID ORDER BY Evalua.onTaskGroupID, Designa.on FOR XML PATH('Evalua.onTask'), TYPE, ELEMENTS XSINIL ) AS Evalua.onTasks
FROM USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on mme INNER JOIN USMC.Evalua.onType et ON mme.Evalua.onTypeID=et.ID WHERE mme.ID IN ( SELECT Mul.MonthEvalua.onID FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on WHERE ID = @MonthEvalID )
FOR XML PATH ('MonthEval-369'), root('MonthEval-369s'), ELEMENTS XSINIL
END
